005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.IDataTypeAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012
013/**
014 * Provides base functionality for atomic item implementations.
015 *
016 * @param <TYPE>
017 *          the Java type of the underlying data value
018 */
019public abstract class AbstractAtomicItemBase<TYPE> implements IAnyAtomicItem {
020
021  @Override
022  @NonNull
023  public abstract IDataTypeAdapter<TYPE> getJavaTypeAdapter();
024
025  @Override
026  public String asString() {
027    return getJavaTypeAdapter().asString(getValue());
028  }
029
030  @Override
031  public String toSignature() {
032    return ObjectUtils.notNull(new StringBuilder()
033        .append(getType().toSignature())
034        .append("(")
035        .append(getValueSignature())
036        .append(")")
037        .toString());
038  }
039
040  @NonNull
041  protected abstract String getValueSignature();
042
043  @NonNull
044  @Override
045  public String toString() {
046    return toSignature();
047  }
048}
